summary: The module automates the creation of a FastAPI service from a JSON schema. It transforms the schema into Pydantic models, fills a Jinja2 application template, and assembles the generated source files. An endpoint leverages OpenAI's async client via the Instructor library and a Jinja2 prompt to produce code based on the supplied schema, returning extracted person details.
business_intent: Enable rapid, schema-driven generation of FastAPI applications and code snippets, reducing manual development effort and streamlining API scaffolding using AI assistance.
